lead_paragraph: The defender Kate Markgraf will return to the United States women’s team for the first time since giving birth to a son on July 18 when the Americans play Taiwan next month. Markgraf, who played for the World Cup champions in 1999, was one of 24 players invited to a training camp for the Oct. 1 game. Coach Greg Ryan will choose 18 players to face Taiwan.
